alert.note: Alert for Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 09 at 2:49AM CDT until July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 463 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OKLAHOMA CANADIAN GRADY IN NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA BLAINE DEWEY ELLIS HARPER MAJOR WOODWARD IN SOUTHERN OKLAHOMA JEFFERSON STEPHENS IN SOUTHWEST OKLAHOMA CADDO COMANCHE COTTON GREER HARMON JACKSON KIOWA TILLMAN IN WESTERN OKLAHOMA BECKHAM CUSTER ROGER MILLS WASHITA IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHERN TEXAS HARDEMAN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALTUS, ANADARKO, ARNETT, BUFFALO, BURNS FLAT, CHEYENNE, CHICKASHA, CLINTON, CONCHO, CORDELL, DUNCAN, EL RENO, ELK CITY, FAIRVIEW, FARGO, FREDERICK, GAGE, GEARY, GRANITE, HAMMON, HINTON, HOBART, HOLLIS, LAVERNE, LAWTON, LEEDEY, MANGUM, MUSTANG, OKEENE, QUANAH, RINGLING, RYAN, SAYRE, SEILING, SENTINEL, SHATTUCK, SNYDER, TALOGA, TEMPLE, TUTTLE, VICI, WALTERS, WATONGA, WAURIKA, WEATHERFORD, WOODWARD, AND YUKON.
